title: Seattle Takes the Lead in AI Tech for Traffic Optimization
description: Seattle has emerged as the inaugural city to test Google’s innovative Project Green Light, a pioneering application of artificial intelligence (AI) aimed at alleviating traffic congestion. Leveraging Google’s vast Maps database, this AI-driven system analyzes data to optimize traffic lights, suggesting improvements to city engineers. The intersection of technology and urban planning has never been […]

title: Government Trials AI-Powered Virtual Assistants for Efficient Communication
description: In a move towards modernizing communication strategies, the Government Communications Service, led by Chief Executive Simon Baugh, is on the verge of introducing an AI-powered virtual assistant. This innovative initiative aims to revolutionize how government communicators interact and engage with the public, marking a significant shift towards embracing cutting-edge technology in the realm of public […]
